issue.title: For the instruction, typos "int his" should be "in this"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-193](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-193). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
 /\*\*
   \* Provide the maximum amount of variable width bytes that can be stored int his vector.
   \* @return
   \*/
  int getByteCapacity();

should be 

 /\*\*
   \* Provide the maximum amount of variable width bytes that can be stored in this vector.
   \* @return
   \*/
  int getByteCapacity();

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-193?focusedCommentId=15276527) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
[~lfz_carlos] there's no need to close an issue after it has been resolved, thank you
